author: Special Correspondent
text:
Ramanathapuram/Sivaganga: Deputy Superintendent of Police K. Maheswari who kicked up a row by claiming that her batchmate and Thiruchengode DSP R. Vishnupriya had committed suicide because of harassment by her superior officials was honoured for meritorious service at the Republic Day celebration here on Tuesday.

She was honoured for cracking a burglar gang and recovering more than 100 sovereigns of jewellery.
title: Vishnupriya’s batchmate honoured
